title: I'd like to read books but I can't able to remember it (I forget it). What should I do? How should I keep in mind? What are some of the best books to improve myself? - Quora

response.answer_text: You Don’t Have To Remember Word To Word (i.e, Everything) Books Are Like River You Only Have To Extract The Part What Your Conscious Finds Correct & By Remembering Key-Points You Can Create Your Own Answers/Principles Accordingly. Books For Self-Improvement:- Think & Grow Rich (Napolean Hill) Because Of These Amazing Lines-   2. Power Of Your Subconscious Mind- (Dr.Joseph Murphy)  Because Of These Amazing Lines-  & Many More Of Them!!!!
